column4: hey guys, can someone help me with broadcom 4306 rev 3 on hardy?.. i've tried everything this whole day, reformatted 4 times already.. does anyone know exactly how to get this wireless card working?.. (actually done it themselves)
have you tried the forums? you will generally ahve more luck when asking with specific hardware models in mind?

i guess i'll make my own post, i've read other posts on the matter, and tried their instructions, they just don't work.. or maybe they posters did something they weren't aware of after a clean install, who knows.. i'll try to post, thanks anyway.
sorry i couldnt help, but good luck man!
